alert.note: Alert for Madison; Orange (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:55PM EST until January 09 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and northwest Virginia, including the following counties, in central Virginia, Greene and Orange. In northwest Virginia, Madison. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 355 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated a broad area of heavy rainfall. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orange... Madison... Stanardsville... Big Meadows... Gordonsville... Ruckersville... Brightwood... Aroda... Twymans Mill... Oakpark... Pratts... Rochelle... Madison Mills... Locust Dale... Montford... Shelby... Montpelier Station... Old Somerset... Somerset... Fordsville... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
